projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: React Native Slider
projects.bodyText: - Contributed to react-native-slider open source project. Added functionality to have milestone icons on slider

projects.title: Resume Manager | DTU
projects.bodyText:
- An interactive web application, which enables student to apply to posted jobs.
 - Companies can post job and add criteria like CGPA, branch etc.
 - Students can only apply baased on criteria.
  - Admin can fetch report, charts via admin console.

projects.title: Efest App | ASME | DTU
projects.bodyText: - Created an interactive application for organizing ASME, DTU's technical fest.
